EmailTemplate.name: PRM ARR NDAC InfoCenter-Rejected
EmailTemplate.subject: Request for access to Nokia DAC Info Center rejected
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Partner,
Your request for access to the Nokia Dac Info Center has been rejected as your company has not signed an NDAC Addendum.
Feel free to launch a new request when the contractual obligations have been fulfilled.
Reach out to partner.support@nokia.com in case of questions.
The Nokia Partner Portal Team
